a: By hiring yoshis, you increase the profitability of your islands. Yoshis work on an open-ended contract and accept payment in coins.
Coins are used to hire new employees and upgrade your island. You can buy them for Yoshitrum
Your islands generate income in money. You can freely exchange your money for Yoshitrum at any time without fees.
The better the restaurent and the level of the kitchen, the more profit it brings.

Revenue from all islands goes to the money basket every hour. Collecting profits every day, you will receive money in your account.It is important to collect income daily; otherwise, you may lose part of the profit
